programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Mu Xing decisively locks in on several key words said by Pan Han and believes there is a powerful organization behind him. Another scientist in Europe dies. Wang Miao asks Ye Wen Jie for advice again, and she calmly continues to tell him her story.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Ye Wen Jie discovers a potential fault while performing equipment maintenance. Her talents are noticed by General Director Lei Zhi Cheng and wants to transfer her to the core department of the Hong'an Project, but is strongly opposed by Yang Wei Ning.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Miao Miao follows You Nian and finds out that he is meeting his female colleague, Darlene. You Nian rejects Darlene, claiming that he loves his wife, but was exposed that he actually does not love her. Miao Miao finds out that You Nian went overseas to work to avoid facing the daily arguments between his mother and her, causing her to feel very angry.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Mandy's father, Ming Fa brings along reporters to look for Mandy to acknowledge him. Reporters suspect that Mandy changed her name to avoid him. Mandy panics and denies that she is Ming Fa's daughter, Liu Mei Jiao, while trying to shut the door. Ming Fa stops her, causing him to get hurt but Mandy ignores it. Reporters publish a video of this situation online, scolding Mandy for being unfilial.

programme.title: Three Adventures of Brooke
programme.desc: On a trip to Malaysia, a woman's tire blows out three times creating three adventures involving different identities with colorful characters. These gradually reveal the true reason for her encounters, which underpin a quest with a mysterious Frenchman.

programme.title: Explore China Shorts
programme.desc: Hal learns how to make Mapo Tofu.

programme.title: Tharlo
programme.desc: Tharlo lives a simple life as a shepherd, but after an encounter with a hairdresser at the barbershop, he embarks on a journey of love, filled with many surprises and mostly disappointments.

programme.title: The Glory of Global Chinese
programme.sub-title: The Global Journey of Kung Fu
programme.desc: Delve into the dynamic world of martial arts and its remarkable journey from traditional Chinese roots to a global cinematic phenomenon. Through exclusive interviews with acclaimed filmmakers Andy Cheng and Mark Dacascos, we explore the profound influence of Chinese martial arts on international cinema. At the heart of our narrative is the legendary Bruce Lee, whose iconic legacy serves as a cornerstone for understanding the evolution and enduring impact of martial arts in Hollywood and beyond.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: The Emperor hints through a chess game that the situation could still turn around and tells Wang Xuan of a secret underground escape route.

programme.title: The Rebel Princess
programme.desc: With the support of Madame Wei, Wei Han follows Wang Xuan's arrangement and successfully evades the pursuit of the soldiers.

programme.title: Modern Dynasty
programme.desc: Yiu-cho passes away, and Yan Sum gives birth prematurely.

programme.title: Modern Dynasty
programme.desc: To fulfill Yiu-cho’s wish, Yan Sum again takes the helm of the new rail terminus site project.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: Wang Miao plays a game with his daughter which inspires him to re-enter the Three-Body game with a new understanding of how to unlock the next level. Mu Xing once again boldly contacts Shen Yufei and decides it's time for her to make a choice.

programme.title: Three-Body
programme.desc: A gravitational pull of the three suns destroys Civilization 184 in the Three-Body game. Pan Han tries to win over Mu Xing with more information, but after recent events, she decides to trust Shi Qiang and steals evidence from Pan Han's computer.

programme.title: My Guardian Angels
programme.desc: Si Jin reunites with Kai Wei who explains that when she was pregnant, Jin Quan objected to them so Kai Wei started a business overseas to earn more money to give her a better life. However, not knowing that he was used to transport drugs, Kai Wei sustained a leg injury and landed himself in jail. Upon returning, he did not dare to find Si Jin.

programme.desc: Tharlo lives a simple life as a shepherd, but after an encounter with a hairdresser at the barbershop, he embarks on a journey of love, filled with many surprises and mostly disappointments.
